page.description: Returns TRUE if table is encrypted.
page.discussion: The <TBL>.ENCRYPTED() method returns .T. (TRUE) if the table referenced by <TBL> is encrypted; otherwise, it returns .F. (FALSE).

section.title: Example
section.description: Open a table, supplying its password, then test its encryption status.
section.example: dim t as P t = table.open("customer",FILE_RW_EXCLUSIVE,"","swordfish") ? t.encrypted() = .T.
